Posts.EditableText:
The time has come for a refresh of the moderators, as some of them haven't even logged in for a while!

If you would like to volunteer, please reply here or send me a PM.

It's nothing particularly difficult - just deleting any spam you see, really, and there's not really very much of that at the moment.
